BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.database.opengauss.metadata.database.system.OpenGaussSystemDatabase.getSystemDatabaseSchemaMap() may expose internal representation by returning OpenGaussSystemDatabase.SYSTEM_DATABASE_SCHEMA_MAP

org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.database.opengauss.metadata.database.system.OpenGaussSystemDatabase.getSystemSchemas() may expose internal representation by returning OpenGaussSystemDatabase.SYSTEM_SCHEMAS
